name: Porygon
flavorText:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

previous.name: Flareon
previous.flavorText:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

next.name: Omanyte
next.flavorText:
Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

pokemon.name: Porygon2
pokemon.flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

pokemon.name: Porygon-Z
pokemon.flavorText:
Additional software was installed
to make it a better Pokémon.
It began acting oddly, however.
